canvas redesign

FINAL RESULT
  • summer 2021
  • HTML
  • SASS
  • 11ty

A redesign of Instructure's Canvas that aims to create a learning management system focused on overall clarity and organization, as well as intuitive use for both students and instructors. The process involved interviewing students, card sorting, and site map testing.
